means: 班扬（美国民间故事中的伐木巨人，力大无比，后成为美国巨大与力量的象征，并用作木材公司的广告形象）

sentence.Network_en: Addison cited Bunyan to prove that even the most despicable of writers had their admirers.
sentence.Network_cn: 艾迪生以班扬为例证明最卑鄙的作家也有人崇拜.

sentence.Network_en: The land of peace described in John Bunyan's Pilgrim's Progress.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰·班扬作品《天路历程》中描绘的安乐地.

sentence.Network_en: My first acquisition was Bunyan's works in separate little volumes.
sentence.Network_cn: 喜爱读航海小说,我的第一部收藏的书是分做小册子的约翰班扬集.

PerfectNetExp.abs: bunya 文屋, bunyan 班扬, bunya 文弥

list.abs: 在本仁约翰（John Bunyan）的天路历程中，基督徒和那位翻译员结伴同行，朝那皇宫走去。整个皇宫四周守森严，而进去的人必 …
文学家的名字_百度知道 ... 托马斯·莫尔 Thomas More 约翰·班扬 John Bunyan 莎士比亚 Shakesprare.

means.word_mean: 1. English preacher and author of an allegorical novel, Pilgrim's Progress (1628-1688)
2. a legendary giant lumberjack of the north woods of the United States and Canada; had a blue ox named Babe;

sentences.sentence: "the lakes of Minnesota began when Paul Bunyan and Babe's footprints filled with water"
